amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to terminate the program detailed in 287(g) of the Immigration and Nationality Act, which allows State and local law enforcement entities to enter into a partnership with Immigration and Customs Enforcement.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used to terminate an agreement governing a delegation of authority under section 287(g) of the Immigration and Nationality Act (8 U.S.C. 1357(g)) that is in existence on the date of the enactment of this Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Sullivan amendment (A037) Agreed to by recorded vote: 250 - 164 (Roll no. 366).
